title: Harry & Meghan Interview Leaves Phillip Feeling Sympathetic For Royal Couple | This Morning
author: This Morning
description:
The wait is finally over. Last night, the world finally got to see Harry and Meghanâ€™s tell-all interview with Oprah Winfrey. But what â€œtruthsâ€ were spoken? And how will the palace react? Our Royal editor Camilla Tominey joins us live in the studio to tell us more. We'll also be joined exclusively by the authors of Harry and Meghan biography â€˜Finding Freedomâ€™, Omid Scobie and Carolyn Durand, to share their first thoughts.
Broadcast on 08/03/21
